reference_frame.description: "Reference frame for station layout.  There are only 2 options geographic and geomagnetic.  Both assume a right-handed coordinate system with North=0 E=90 and vertical positive downward"

angle_to_geographic_north.description: "Angle to rotate the data to align with geographic north. If this number is 0 then it is assumed the data are aligned with geographic north in a right handed coordinate system."
